import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor() { } isMenuActive = false; setClass () { this.isMenuActive = !this.isMenuActive; this.checkActiveMenu(this.isMenuActive) } checkActiveMenu (elemToCheck:boolean) { } }
